channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：美国连锁百货公司诺德斯特龙（Nordstrom）背后的家族正在探索将其私有化。@sharonlam_解释说，既要赢得正在承受亏损的股东的支持，又要承诺足够高的回报，让任何收购伙伴满意，这将是一件非常棘手的事情。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: The family behind US department store chain Nordstrom is exploring taking it private. Winning over shareholders nursing losses while promising high enough returns to keep any buyout partners happy will be tricky, @sharonlam_ explains pic.twitter.com/YFYF25O836

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: 美国三大股指在清淡交投中收低，投资者在假期缩短的一周中等待经济数据，以判断美联储的政策路径。更多信息
item.description:
All three major US stock indexes closed lower amid light trading as investors awaited economic data in a holiday-shortened week to gauge the Federal Reserve's policy path. Read more https://t.co/mfTQY0Ewte pic.twitter.com/vhLYXOvS2E

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.title: Krispy Kreme 表示，随着麦当劳和 Krispy Kreme 试点项目的扩大，到 2026 年底，麦当劳在美国的所有餐厅都能买到 Krispy Kreme 的甜甜圈。更多信息
item.description:
Krispy Kreme said its donuts would be available across McDonald's US restaurants by the end of 2026 as the companies expand a pilot project, sending its shares surging. Read more https://t.co/pMRhMI6WqE pic.twitter.com/Fmk4vMJUOf

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 27, 2024

item.description:
Trump Media & Technology Group shares surged more than 36% in their debut on the Nasdaq which comes more than two years since its merger with a blank-check firm was announced. Read more https://t.co/MqzI048kyk pic.twitter.com/hzQsbjMlUq

item.title: 观看：中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪公布了自2022年以来最缓慢的季度利润增长，原因是在残酷的价格战中，电动汽车在全球最大的汽车市场的销售失去了动力
item.description:

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: Krispy Kreme 公司和麦当劳表示，他们计划在 2026 年底之前，在这家快餐巨头的美国餐厅中提供 Krispy Kreme 甜甜圈，之后该公司股价大涨。更多信息
item.description:
Krispy Kreme shares surged after the company and McDonald's said they plan to provide Krispy Kreme's donuts across the fast-food giant's US restaurants by the end of 2026. Read more https://t.co/pMRhMI6oB6 pic.twitter.com/mnPkKb23GM

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 特朗普传媒与科技集团周二在纳斯达克首次上市时股价大涨超过 36%，使该公司未摊薄后的市值超过 90 亿美元。更多信息
item.description:
Trump Media & Technology Group shares surged more than 36% in their debut on the Nasdaq on Tuesday, taking the company's market capitalization to over $9 billion on an undiluted basis. Read more https://t.co/MqzI048kyk pic.twitter.com/MUuP4exhGy

item.title: 观看：英国网上超市 Ocado Retail 公布第一季度收入增长 10.6%，反映了客户数量的增长，并保持了今年的指导目标。

item.title: 观看：比亚迪的大幅折扣可能帮助其取代特斯拉成为全球电动汽车销量冠军，但也对其造成了打击。这家中国汽车制造商的季度利润增长速度为两年来最慢。
item.description:
WATCH: BYD’s heavy discounts may have helped it unseat Tesla as the world’s top EV seller but hit it too. The Chinese carmaker reported its slowest quarterly profit rise in two years https://t.co/44T38kJVUY pic.twitter.com/P5tGhinXv0
